v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What will He not bestow! Who freely gave this mighty gift unbought, Unmerited, unheeded, and unsought, What will He not bestow?{/lang-eng}

v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}’Tis God that justifies! Who shall recall His pardon or His grace? Or who the broken chain of guilt replace? ’Tis God that justifies!{/lang-eng}
